document.masterDocTitle: A revision of the genus Ora Clark, 1865 (Coleoptera: Scirtidae) in Argentina (part II) — redescriptions, updated distributions and a key to species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A revision of the genus Ora Clark, 1865 (Coleoptera: Scirtidae) in Argentina (part II) — redescriptions, updated distributions and a key to species

heading.emphasis:
Key to the Argentine species of the genus
Ora

paragraph.keyLead:
1 Body reddish testaceous with antennae, legs and apical part of elytra dark brown to black (
Figs. 1–3
)...................................................................................................
Ora atroapicalis
Pic, 1928

2 Head, pronotum and scutellar shield brown, elytra uniformly yellow or yellow with brown spots ( Figs. 20, 21 )..........................................................................................
Ora semibrunnea
Pic, 1922

5 Body oval, TL/EW 1.3–1.4 (
Libonatti 2014 : fig. 22
). Penis narrower, with a shorter lateral protuberance (
Libonatti 2014 : fig. 38
).....................................................................
Ora brevieminentia
Libonatti, 2014

- Body oblong oval, TL/EW 1.7–1.8 ( Figs. 18, 19 ). Penis broader, with a longer lateral protuberance (
Fig. 100
)...........................................................................................
Ora platensis
Brèthes, 1925

6 Body broadly oval (
Figs. 6–12
). Elytra punctation not uniform, with intermixed coarser punctures. Penis rod-shaped (
Figs. 68
, 117 ). Prehensor without well-defined sclerites ( Figs. 54 ,
74 , 122
)................................................ 7

- Body oval or elliptical (
Figs. 13 –17, 22– 25
). Elytra punctation uniform, without intermixed coarser punctures. Penis not rodshaped (
Figs. 86
, 133 ). Prehensor with well-defined sclerites (
Figs. 90
, 138,139)................................... 9

8 Elytra yellow with non-coalescent small brown spots (
Fig. 6
). Anterior margin of bursal sclerite rounded, not notched (
Fig. 56
)....................................................................................
Ora bruchi
Pic, 1928
